title: SELECT_PATIENT
description: SELECT id as "id", pt_no as "ptNo", name as "name", sex as "sex", age as "age", resident_no1 as "residentNo1", resident_no2 as "residentNo2", created_at as "createdAt" FROM ods.tbl_patient WHERE pt_no = :ptNo

title: SELECT_CHART_LIST
description: SELECT c.chart_no as "chartNo", c.pt_no as "ptNo", c.label as "label", c.code as "code", c.in_date as "inDate", c.out_date as "outDate", c.department as "department", c.doctor as "doctor", c.created_at as "createdAt", p.name as "patientName" FROM ods.tbl_chart c JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON c.pt_no = p.pt_no WHERE p.pt_no = :ptNo AND (:term = 100 OR c.in_date BETWEEN DATEADD('YEAR', -CAST(:term AS integer), CURRENT_DATE) AND CURRENT_DATE) ORDER BY c.in_date DESC

title: SELECT_FORM_LIST
description: SELECT r.form_no as "formNo", r.parent_form_no as "parentFormNo", r.pt_no as "ptNo", r.chart_no as "chartNo", r.name as "name", r.type as "type", r.record_data as "recordData", r.created_at as "createdAt", p.name as "patientName" FROM ods.tbl_form r JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON r.pt_no = p.pt_no WHERE r.chart_no IN (:chartNos) ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
